fields.headline: Cricket World Cup Show
fields.bodyText: What an ending! Pure farce. But the Aussies deserve to win and in the studio with Rob Curling we have Sam Collins, Andy Bull and Rob Smyth reviewing the match and the tournament. Mike Selvey is on the line from Barbados and delivers his thoughts on the seven-week 'festival of cricket'. Thanks to everyone for your input into the podcasts! Click here to listen now on your computer. Click here to subscribe free, via iTunes, and get the latest episode on your iPod. For the Cricket World Cup Show podcast feed, click here.
